meanings.definition: To partially cook food by boiling it briefly.
meanings.sent1: I parboiled the vegetables before adding them to the soup.
meanings.sent2: She always parboils the rice before stir-frying it.
meanings.sent3: The chef accidentally parboiled the pasta for too long, making it mushy.
meanings.sent4: The idea was parboiled in my mind, slowly simmering to perfection.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the parboiled garlic filled the kitchen, enticing everyone to come and eat.

meanings.sent1: The recipe called for parboiled potatoes to be used in the casserole.
meanings.sent2: The parboiled chicken was ready to be grilled to perfection.
meanings.sent3: The parboiled eggs were bouncing around the kitchen, trying to escape the pot.
meanings.sent4: Her parboiled emotions were evident in her teary eyes.
meanings.sent5: The parboiled vegetables retained their crunchiness, adding texture to the dish.
